Accessed on 2008-07-02. | population_total = 552539 | population_as_of = 2008 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +01 | iso_code = DZ-30 | area_code_type = Area Code | area_code = +213 (0) 32 | blank_name_sec1 = Districts | blank_info_sec1 = 10 | blank1_name_sec1 = Municipalities | blank1_info_sec1 = 21 | website = | footnotes = }} Ouargla or Warqla is a province in eastern Algeria. Its capital is Ouargla. Other important towns are Temacine, Touggourt, and Hassi Messaoud. It contains the Issaouane Erg desert. ==Divisions== The province has 10 districts and 21 communes or municipalities. ===Districts=== # El Borma # El Hadjira # Hassi Messaoud # Mégarine # N'Goussa # Ouargla # Sidi Khouiled # Taïbet # Témacine # Touggourt ==References== Category:Provinces of Algeria
title: Ouargla Province
